meanings.definition: A type of fish that belongs to the sea bass family.
meanings.sent1: The groupers swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: We went fishing and caught some groupers for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The groupers had a meeting to discuss their underwater adventures.
meanings.sent4: The groupers in the sea were like a close-knit family.
meanings.sent5: The colorful groupers stood out among the other fish.

meanings.definition: A group of people or things that are gathered together.
meanings.sent1: The school children formed a groupers to play a game.
meanings.sent2: The groupers of stars in the sky looked mesmerizing.
meanings.sent3: The groupers of toys on the shelf seemed to be having a party.
meanings.sent4: The groupers of clouds in the sky resembled fluffy cotton balls.
meanings.sent5: The groupers of flowers in the garden created a beautiful sight.
